passive_2: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage and heals you for 75% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage and heals you for 50% bonus AD over 2 seconds.

motd: Change: Taking damage from Ignore Pain no longer interrupts Recall.

passive_2: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage and heals you for 140% bonus AD over 2 seconds.

motd: Bugfix: Triggering Defy now properly removes all instances of stored damage by Ignore Pain.

passive_1: Stores [30%|10%] of all post-mitigation physical and magical damage received, which is successively taken as damage over time true damage instead, dealing one-third of the stored damage every second.
passive_2: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage and heals you for 175% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
motd: Change: Ignore Pain now also stores damage received to shields.

passive_2: Champion takedowns remove Ignore Pain's remaining damage and heal you for 15% of your maximum health over the duration.

motd: Bugfix: No longer extends Aspect of the Dragon's burn damage longer than intended (3 seconds)

passive_1: Stores [35%|15%] of all post-mitigation physical damage received, which is successively taken as damage over time true damage instead, dealing one-third of the stored damage every second.
passive_2: Champion takedowns grant you 30% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds, remove Ignore Pain's remaining damage, and heal you for 10% of your maximum health over the duration.
Stores [30%|10%] of all physical and magical damage received, and is taken as a damage over time instead, dealing one-third of the stored damage every second.
Stores [30%|20%] of all physical and magical damage received, and is taken as a damage over time instead, dealing one-third of the stored damage every second.

motd: Bugfix: The last tick of stored damage now properly kills the target champion instead of leaving them at 1 health
Hotfix-Bugfix: Passive no longer infinitely triggers Infernal Dragon Soul.
Bugfix: Getting damaged by an Aery user while having Death's Dance equipped no longer causes Aery to continuously deal damage to the player.
Bugfix: Omni-vamp now properly grants reduced healing from pets
Bugfix: No longer grants excessive healing from Urgot's Fear Beyond Death against Tryndamere's Undying Rage or Anivia's Rebirth.

passive_1: Instantly heal for 15% of all damage dealt. Area of effect physical damage only heals 5% for every unit affected.

passive_2: Stores 30% of all physical and magical damage received, and is taken as a damage over time instead, dealing one-third of the stored damage every second.

motd: Undocumented: Bleed effect now doesn't cancel Recall
